info.title: MixerBox Translate
info.description: Learn various languages by conversing with AI in foreign languages.

learning_language.description: The language that the user is learning and inquiring about, it is important to use the full name of the language rather than an abbreviation or nickname. This will help to avoid confusion and ensure clear communication between both parties (e.g. English, Japanese).

native_language.description: The full name of the language to indicate the user's native language, which can be inferred from the language they used to ask their question (e.g. English, Japanese).
